name: 專題討論（一）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)、輔系修習  ◎限碩一修習 ◎課程不開放上修
goals: The objectives of this course are to provide graduate students with the knowledge and understanding of recent development and research trends in the field of earth sciences.
syllabus:
Faculty members in charge of this course regularly (typically once a week) invite scholars and researchers, in the field of earth sciences (including its sub-fields such as geology, geo-physics, astronomy, atmospheric sciences, and oceanography), from other universities and institutes in Taiwan or overseas to offer lectures on their recent research and latest results. Discussions will also take place after the lectures. The objectives of this course are to provide graduate students with the ability of expressing oneself in a short amount of time and training of systematic thinking.

Schedule:  
Week 1-8: Invited guest speakers on different disciplines  
Week 8-16: Group discussion and student presentation. Topics could be decide by students or professor.
